unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah? Heard it's a stress fracture. Dr. Sharma said it could be months. Also, what about Hardik? Hope his ankle's okay for the Asia Cup. Need him batting like he did in the IPL! Recover soon, you two! This is more important than even getting Rs. 5000 off a new TV. The team needs you both firing on all cylinders to defend that 2000 sq ft plot in Bangalore from encroachment!
normalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah? Heard it's a stress fracture. Doctor Sharma said it could be months. Also, what about Hardik? Hope his ankle's okay for the Asia Cup. Need him batting like he did in the I P L! Recover soon, you two! This is more important than even getting rupees five thousand off a new T V. The team needs you both firing on all cylinders to defend that two thousand square feet plot in Bangalore from encroachment!
